Name: Jelly Bomber
About the game: Get combos, use special powers and drop bombs on fruit to create delicious Jelly Jam! From the creators of 100 Rogues and Auro: A Monster-Bumping Adventure ! Jelly Bomber is a fun abstract puzzle game where you make combos by connecting four pieces of the same color. Connect four and get a combo! It's super-easy to learn, but in order to master the game, you'll need to be smart about using fruit-powers and the special abilities of your character. Climb the ranks and learn the forbidden mysteries of Jelly Bombing! FEATURES: - Vibrant, colorful and fun pixel art by Blake Reynolds - 3 fruit powers which activate when you get combos involving them - Original melodic soundtrack - 3 cool characters you can play as, with more on the way - 'Single-player Elo' system means you're always playing at the right skill level for you (first innovated in our last game, Auro !) - Multiplayer modes coming soon If you've ever enjoyed games like Dr. Mario , Puyo Puyo or even Tetris , you'll love Jelly Bomber!
